Yes, it is great to see that sustainable options are becoming more popular in the hospitality industry. As more consumers are becoming environmentally conscious, hotels are recognizing the need to adopt sustainable practices to meet the demands of their guests. Additionally, sustainable practices can also improve guest experiences by providing healthier environments and amenities. By incorporating sustainability into their operations, hotels can not only reduce their impact on the environment but also appeal to eco-conscious customers who are willing to pay a premium for sustainable accommodations. 

In conclusion, it is exciting to see the trend towards sustainability in the hospitality industry and the positive impact that it can have on both the environment and the guest experience.
